skills.label: Can name common farm animals (cow, pig, chicken, goat)
Can name what farm animals provide (milk, eggs, wool, meat)
Can name basic plant parts (seed, root, stem, leaf, flower, fruit)
Can describe what plants need to grow (sun, water, soil)
Can sequence the stages of a plant life cycle (seed, sprout, plant, flower, fruit/seed)
Can identify which foods come from plants and name the plant part we eat
Can identify which foods come from animals and name the animal
Can trace a food item from its farm origin to the plate
Can use senses to observe and describe a living thing (animal or plant)
Can draw and label an observation of a living thing
